entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a dragon that Hagrid has been keeping in his hut.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is against the idea of keeping dragons.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of Ron's friends who is curious about Hagrid's activities.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is also curious about Hagrid's activities.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has been keeping a dragon in his hut.

relationships.description: Ron opposes the idea of keeping dragons, specifically Norbert.
Harry is curious about Hagrid's activities with Norbert.
Hermione is also curious about Hagrid's activities with Norbert.
Ron opposes the idea of keeping dragons, which Hagrid has been doing.
The Ministry of Magic influences Hagrid's actions by making him put spells on Muggles who have spotted dragons.
Muggles interact with the Ministry of Magic when they spot dragons.
